casebody.data:
State
v.
Dale Patrick Martin 210P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016 *778Charlotte G. Blake, Attorney at Law, Boone, Dale P. Martin, for Martin, Dale Patrick. Michael T. Wood, Special Deputy Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of May 2016 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016."
